mapper.select: select count(1) as totalcnt from VTUSER where (UNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or UID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

select VIEWID ,UNAME ,DEPT_NM ,ORG_NM ,UID ,ACCEPT_YN ,DESCRIPTION ,UEMAIL ,'' as INITPW ,to_char(a.CRE_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CHAR_CRE_DT from VTUSER a where (UNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or UID like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') and ROLE not in ('ADMIN','MANAGER') order by VIEWID desc OFFSET ${first} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${last} ROWS ONLY

select count(1) as totalcnt from VTQNA a where DEL_YN !='Y'
AND ANSWER !=''
AND ANSWER =''
and (TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or QUESTION LIKE '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

select a.*, b.UNAME, a.CRE_DT as CHAR_CRE_DT , ,to_char(a.UPD_DT,'YYYY-MM-DD HH24:MI:SS') as CHAR_UPD_DT from VTQNA a , VTUSER b where DEL_YN !='Y'
AND ANSWER !=''
AND ANSWER =''
and a.CRE_ID = b.VIEWID and (TITLE like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or QUESTION like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by QNAID desc OFFSET ${first} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${last} ROWS ONLY

select count(1) as TOTALCNT from VTCONNECTION a
where 1=1
, VTDATABASE_MANAGER_ROLE b where a.VCONNID = b.VCONNID and b.VIEWID = #{customParam.uid}
and (a.VNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or a.VURL like '%'||#{keyword}||'%')

select a.VCONNID ,a.VNAME from VTCONNECTION a
where 1=1
, VTDATABASE_MANAGER_ROLE b where a.VCONNID = b.VCONNID and b.VIEWID = #{customParam.uid}
and (a.VNAME like '%'||#{keyword}||'%' or a.VURL like '%'||#{keyword}||'%') order by a.VCONNID desc OFFSET ${first} ROWS FETCH FIRST ${last} ROWS ONLY
select * from VTUSER a left outer join VTDATABASE_USER_ROLE b on a.VIEWID = b.VIEWID and b.VCONNID = #{vconnid} where (b.VCONNID = #{vconnid} or b.VCONNID is null )

select to_char(max(START_TIME),'yyyy-mm-dd') VIEW_DATE, CASE WHEN s_mm >= 10 then cast(S_MM AS CHAR(2)) else '0'||CAST (S_MM AS CHAR(1)) END||'-'||CAST(CAST (S_DD AS CHAR(2)) AS VARCHAR(2)) X_COL , count(1) as Y_COL from VTSQL_LOG a where VCONNID=#{vconnid} and START_TIME between #{s_date} and #{e_date} group by S_MM , S_DD order by S_MM, S_DD
